articles.author: Toyin Owoseje
articles.title: 'Best birthday present ever' -- Jane Fonda says her cancer is in remission - CNN
articles.description: Just three months after being diagnosed with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, Jane Fonda has announced that her cancer is now in remission and she is set to stop chemotherapy treatment.
articles.content:
Just three months after being diagnosed with non-Hodgkins lymphoma, Jane Fonda has announced that her cancer is now in remission and she is set to stop chemotherapy treatment.
